org.cs2c.nginlib.monitor
接口 Monitor

public interface Monitor

作者：
Mikes

This interface will get the various host status by remote operating. The status type includes CPU, IO, network, mid-ware and memory.

另请参见：
CPUStatus, IOStatus, NetworkStatus, MemoryStatus, MiddlewareStatus

方法摘要
 CPUStatus getCPUStatus()
          Remotely fetch the CPU status info, and return a CPUStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 IOStatus getIOStatus()
          Remotely fetch the IO status info, and return a IOStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 MemoryStatus getMemoryStatus()
          Remotely fetch the memory status info, and return a MemoryStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 MiddlewareStatus getMiddlewareStatus()
          Remotely fetch the mid-ware status info, and return a MiddlewareStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 NetworkStatus getNetworkStatus()
          Remotely fetch the network status info, and return a NetworkStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
 

方法详细信息

getCPUStatus

CPUStatus getCPUStatus()
                       throws RemoteException
Remotely fetch the CPU status info, and return a CPUStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched. The command can be "vmstat" on the remote host.

返回：
A CPUStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

getIOStatus

IOStatus getIOStatus()
                     throws RemoteException
Remotely fetch the IO status info, and return a IOStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched. The command can be "vmstat" and "iostat" on the remote host.

返回：
A IOStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

getNetworkStatus

NetworkStatus getNetworkStatus()
                               throws RemoteException
Remotely fetch the network status info, and return a NetworkStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched. The command can be "ifstat" on the remote host but ifstat tool need be installed individually.

返回：
A NetworkStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

getMemoryStatus

MemoryStatus getMemoryStatus()
                             throws RemoteException
Remotely fetch the memory status info, and return a MemoryStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched. The command can be "vmstat" and "free" on the remote host but ifstat tool need be installed individually.

返回：
A MemoryStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.

getMiddlewareStatus

MiddlewareStatus getMiddlewareStatus()
                                     throws RemoteException
Remotely fetch the mid-ware status info, and return a MiddlewareStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.

返回：
A MiddlewareStatus handler by which to get the info already fetched.
抛出：
RemoteException - When this remote operation fails for any non-local reason.
